description: Basic chat interface - send a simple message and receive a streaming response
steps: Step 1: Navigate to the application homepage
Step 2: Verify the chat input field is visible and enabled
Step 3: Type 'Hello, can you help me?' into the input field
Step 4: Click the send button or press Enter
Step 5: Verify the user message appears in the chat area
Step 6: Verify a typing indicator appears
Step 7: Verify the assistant response streams in word-by-word
